column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I was so excited to see a menu item that was completely Keto inspired! I had weight loss surgery (gastric bypass) recently and it's tough for me to find food I can really eat and this was so perfect! The sugar free syrup is what sent me over the edge with happiness. Having sugar free options is so nice! The food was delicious and I'm really excited to eat the leftovers
